title: State Department yanks visas from Mexican executives in migrant smuggling crackdown
description: State Department revokes visas for Mexican airline executives accused of helping smuggling networks transport migrants to the U.S. border in major crackdown.
content:
FIRST ON FOX: The State Department is yanking visas from Mexican executives it says helped move unlawful migrants toward the U.S. border, Fox News Digital has learned.
The department revoked visas a… [+2681 chars]
